name: Rype
overview:
RY.PE is your one stop solution to bookmark, shorten, share and comment all your favorite websites! We have merged the potential of social bookmarking services, to save you all the hassle and give you all the goodness.

After you login in, simply give RY.PE the URL, add an optional comment and click “Shorten”. That URL will be saved under your profile, to make it easy to find it later and to let your friends comment on it. It will also be translated to a short version, which makes sharing the URL easier. And it will be (optionally) spread to all your friends through Twitter, so everyone can see what you’re doing right now!

Signup NOW to start enjoying the simplest way to disseminate your URLs through your social network, and to centralize your web addresses management!
